content: *a sweet treat that s guilt-free this donut is perfect food for a play kitchen or a decorative gift for a dessert lover lion brand yarn * skill level easy 6-7 different colors 1 ball each *materials are sufficient for multiple doughnuts * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing craft glue worked in continuous rounds doughnut base is worked in one color then stuffed decoration on top is glued on some construction required to finish available in different colorways 80113ad 1 2008 6 colors 1 ball each *deco camel chocolate clove blush french vanilla* 80113b 2 2011 7 colors 1 ball each *deco chocolate beige toffee pink dusty rose almond* see also amigurumi frosted doughnut #80114ad 3 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-doughnut-2 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/80113b html 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-frosted-doughnut-80114ad
